title: Josette Sheeran | The Belfer Center for Science and International Affairs

quotes: Sheeran was in residence at the Future of Diplomacy Project late April through early May, 2013.

organizations.name: World Economic Forum
quotes: Josette Sheeran is vice chairman of the World Economic Forum and former executive director of the United Nations World Food Program, the world’s largest humanitarian agency.

organizations.name: United Nations World Food Program
quotes: Josette Sheeran is vice chairman of the World Economic Forum and former executive director of the United Nations World Food Program, the world’s largest humanitarian agency.

organizations.name: US Under Secretary of State
quotes: She previously served as US Under Secretary of State and deputy US Trade Representative.

organizations.name: US Trade Representative
quotes: She previously served as US Under Secretary of State and deputy US Trade Representative.

organizations.name: Empower America
quotes: Before entering public service she was President and CEO of Empower America, a Washington D.C. think tank, where she pursued an agenda of economic empowerment for inner cities and developing nations.

organizations.name: Belfer Center for Science and International Affairs
quotes: Sheeran is a Fisher Family Fellow at the Future of Diplomacy Project at the Belfer Center for Science and International Affairs.

quotes: Sheeran is a Fisher Family Fellow at the Future of Diplomacy Project at the Belfer Center for Science and International Affairs.
